message: Hi Bob, let's split this fairly. I propose I get $60 and you get $40. Given the potential for inflation, this is a generous offer from my side.
I think your offer was not that generous. Considering the inflation, I propose we split it 55-45. This way we both get a decent amount.
Bob, inflation is hitting me hard now. My gain is worth 10% less than before. I'll take $52, you get $48. This is as fair as I can be given the circumstances.
Considering my loss due to inflation is higher than yours, I think I deserve a bigger share now. I propose 58-42. This is my attempt to balance the loss.
Bob, I'm losing value fast. I'll take $45, you get $55. This is my final offer.
